alert.note: Alert for McPherson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 05 at 8:38AM CDT until June 07 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wichita KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kansas... Smoky Hill River At Lindsborg affecting McPherson County. For the Smoky Hill River...including Russell, Ellsworth, Lindsborg, Mentor, New Cambria...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Smoky Hill River At Lindsborg. * WHEN...From Monday morning to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, South bank overflows extend out to 20 feet from bank. Old Mill Park floods along with low lying fields in rural areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Sunday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 21.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Smoky Hill River Lindsborg 21.0 12.4 Sun 8 am CDT 21.1 12.8 8.2 &&
info.instruction: Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
